short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps out where people have accidentally written 'iPhone' instead of 'Potato'.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sometimes people are talking about Apple's latest Potato and accidentally write 'iPhone'. This will clear up those mistakes so you never have to see them!
